mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT pt.MENU_LEVEL, pt.MENU_TYPE, SUM(USE_YN) AS USE_CNT, SUM(pt.LEVEL_CNT) AS LEVEL_CNT FROM( SELECT R1.R1 AS MENU_LEVEL, R1.R2 AS MENU_TYPE, USE_YN, IFNULL(R2.LEVEL_CNT, 0) AS LEVEL_CNT FROM ( SELECT 1 AS R1, 1 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 1 AS R1, 2 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 1 AS R1, 3 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 1 AS R1, 4 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 1 AS R1, 5 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS R1, 1 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS R1, 2 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS R1, 3 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS R1, 4 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS R1, 5 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS R1, 1 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS R1, 2 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS R1, 3 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS R1, 4 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS R1, 5 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS R1, 1 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS R1, 2 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS R1, 3 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS R1, 4 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS R1, 5 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS R1, 1 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS R1, 2 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS R1, 3 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS R1, 4 AS R2 UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS R1, 5 AS R2 ) R1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MENU_LEVEL, MENU_TYPE, SUM(USE_YN) AS USE_YN, COUNT(MENU_LEVEL) AS LEVEL_CNT FROM( SELECT CASE WHEN USE_YN='Y' AND DEL_YN='N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS USE_YN, MENU_TYPE, LEVEL AS MENU_LEVEL, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TITLE, '>') as PAGE_NAVI FROM MC_CMS_MENU a START WITH PARENT_MENU_SEQ = nvl(#{site_id}, '1') CONNECT BY PRIOR CMS_MENU_SEQ = PARENT_MENU_SEQ ORDER SIBLINGS BY a.MENU_ORDER ) T1 GROUP BY MENU_LEVEL, MENU_TYPE ) R2 ON R1.R1=R2.MENU_LEVEL AND R1.R2=R2.MENU_TYPE )pt GROUP BY MENU_LEVEL, MENU_TYPE WITH ROLLUP )pt1 WHERE MENU_LEVEL IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MENU_LEVEL IS NULL, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_TYPE, MENU_TYPE IS NULL DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) as CNT FROM mc_analytics WHERE YMD >= #{start_dt} AND YMD <= #{end_dt}

SELECT PT1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_SEQ, A.BOARD_SEQ, C.CMS_MENU_SEQ, C.PARENT_MENU_SEQ, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_NM, A.TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, A.REG_NM FROM MC_ARTICLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MC_BOARD B ON A.BOARD_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ JOIN MC_CMS_MENU C ON A.BOARD_SEQ = C.BOARD_SEQ WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.SITE_ID = #{site_id} ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC ) T1 ) PT1
WHERE RN <= #{rows}

SELECT PT1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_SEQ, A.BOARD_SEQ, C.CMS_MENU_SEQ, C.PARENT_MENU_SEQ, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_NM, A.TITLE, A.VIEW_CNT, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, A.REG_NM AS REG_NM FROM MC_ARTICLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MC_BOARD B ON A.BOARD_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ JOIN MC_CMS_MENU C ON A.BOARD_SEQ = C.BOARD_SEQ WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.SITE_ID = #{site_id} ORDER BY A.VIEW_CNT DESC ) T1 ) PT1
WHERE RN <= #{rows}

SELECT SUM(TODAY_CNT) AS TODAY_CNT, SUM(YESTERDAY_CNT) AS YESTERDAY_CNT, SUM(WEEK_CNT) AS WEEK_CNT, SUM(MONTH_CNT) AS MONTH_CNT FROM( SELECT COUNT(1) AS TODAY_CNT , 0 AS YESTERDAY_CNT , 0 AS WEEK_CNT , 0 AS MONTH_CNT FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdatetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS TODAY_CNT , COUNT(1) AS YESTERDAY_CNT , 0 AS WEEK_CNT , 0 AS MONTH_CNT FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdatetime - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS TODAY_CNT , 0 AS YESTERDAY_CNT , COUNT(1) AS WEEK_CNT , 0 AS MONTH_CNT FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdatetime, 'iw'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdatetime, 'iw')+6, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS TODAY_CNT , 0 AS YESTERDAY_CNT , 0 AS WEEK_CNT , COUNT(1) AS MONTH_CNT FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdatetime, 'YYYY-MM-')||'01' AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(sysdatetime),'YYYY-MM-DD') )T

SELECT PT1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT a.MEMBER_ID, b.MEMBER_NM, COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM MC_ANALYTICS a JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE GROUP_SEQ <> 1) b ON a.MEMBER_ID=b.MEMBER_ID GROUP BY a.MEMBER_ID, b.MEMBER_NM ) T1 ) PT1 WHERE RN <= 5

SELECT SUM(CNT1) AS CNT1, SUM(CNT2) AS CNT2, SUM(CNT3) AS CNT3, SUM(CNT4) AS CNT4, SUM(CNT5) AS CNT5 FROM( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2, 0 AS CNT3, 0 AS CNT4, 0 AS CNT5 FROM MC_USER_MEMBER WHERE DEL_YN='N' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT1, COUNT(1) AS CNT2, 0 AS CNT3, 0 AS CNT4, 0 AS CNT5 FROM MC_USER_MEMBER WHERE DEL_YN='Y' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2, COUNT(1) AS CNT3, 0 AS CNT4, 0 AS CNT5 FROM MC_USER_MEMBER WHERE DORMANCY_YN='Y' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2, 0 AS CNT3, COUNT(1) AS CNT4, 0 AS CNT5 FROM MC_USER_MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYMMDD')=TO_CHAR(sysdatetime, 'YYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2, 0 AS CNT3, 0 AS CNT4, COUNT(1) AS CNT5 FROM MC_USER_MEMBER WHERE DEL_YN='Y' AND TO_CHAR(DEL_DT, 'YYMMDD')=TO_CHAR(sysdatetime, 'YYMMDD') )T1

SELECT A.* , B.* FROM( SELECT #{site_id} AS CMS_MENU_SEQ, SITE_ID, LOGOUT_TIME_YN, LOGOUT_TIME, PW_CHANGE_YN, PW_CHANGE_CYCLE, DORMANCY_YN, DORMANCY_DAY, ADM_LOGOUT_TIME_YN, ADM_LOGOUT_TIME, ADM_PW_CHANGE_YN, ADM_PW_CHANGE_CYCLE, ADM_DORMANCY_YN, ADM_DORMANCY_DAY FROM MC_BASIC_SETTING WHERE SITE_ID='1' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN MC_CMS_MENU B ON A.CMS_MENU_SEQ = B.CMS_MENU_SEQ

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN A.DEL_YN='N' AND A.USE_YN='Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.DEL_YN='Y' OR A.USE_YN='N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT2, MAX(B.NAME) AS NAME, MAX(B.BOARD_TYPE) AS BOARD_TYPE FROM MC_BOARD A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN BOARD_TYPE IN('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F') THEN BOARD_TYPE ELSE 'X' END AS BOARD_TYPE, CASE WHEN BOARD_TYPE IN('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F') THEN NAME ELSE 'X' END AS NAME FROM MC_BOARD_LIST ) B ON A.BOARD_TYPE = B.BOARD_TYPE GROUP BY B.BOARD_TYPE, B.NAME ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT, SUM(CNT1) AS CNT1, SUM(CNT2) AS CNT2 FROM( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2 FROM MC_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN='N' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT, COUNT(1) AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2 FROM MC_BOARD WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND DEL_YN='N' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT, 0 AS CNT1, COUNT(1) AS CNT2 FROM MC_BOARD WHERE USE_YN='N' AND DEL_YN='N' ) T1

SELECT SUM(CNT1) AS CNT1, SUM(CNT2) AS CNT2, SUM(CNT3) AS CNT3, SUM(CNT4) AS CNT4 FROM( SELECT COUNT(CMS_MENU_SEQ) AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2, 0 AS CNT3, 0 AS CNT4 FROM MC_CMS_MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_SEQ=0 AND DEL_YN='N' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT1, COUNT(SEQ) AS CNT2, 0 AS CNT3, 0 AS CNT4 FROM MC_PROGRAMS WHERE DEL_YN='N' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2, (CASE WHEN COALESCE(TWT_CONSUMER_KEY, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) + (CASE WHEN COALESCE(FACE_APPID, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) + (CASE WHEN COALESCE(NAV_CLIENT_ID, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) + (CASE WHEN COALESCE(GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) + (CASE WHEN COALESCE(INSTA_CLIENT_ID, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) + (CASE WHEN COALESCE(KAO_CLIENT_ID, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS CNT3, 0 AS CNT4 FROM MC_COMMENT_SNS_ACCOUNT UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2, 0 AS CNT3, COUNT(SEQ) AS CNT4 FROM MC_IP_ALLOW WHERE DEL_YN='N' ) T1

SELECT NVL((JUMIN_TOTAL + BUSINO_TOTAL + BUBINO_TOTAL + EMAIL_TOTAL + CELL_TOTAL + TEL_TOTAL + CARD_TOTAL), 0) AS TOTAL FROM( SELECT SUM(A.JUMIN_CNT) AS JUMIN_TOTAL, SUM(A.BUSINO_CNT) AS BUSINO_TOTAL, SUM(A.BUBINO_CNT) AS BUBINO_TOTAL, SUM(A.EMAIL_CNT) AS EMAIL_TOTAL, SUM(A.CELL_CNT) AS CELL_TOTAL, SUM(A.TEL_CNT) AS TEL_TOTAL, SUM(A.CARD_CNT) AS CARD_TOTAL FROM MC_PERSONAL_DATA A ) T1

SELECT SUM(CNT1) AS CNT1, SUM(CNT2) AS CNT2 FROM( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT1, 0 AS CNT2 FROM MC_RESERVE WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND STATUS='I' AND GUBUN='M' UNION ALL SELECT 0 CNT1, COUNT(1) AS CNT2 FROM MC_RESERVE WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND STATUS='I' AND GUBUN='B' )T

SELECT SELECTER, SELECTER_NM, SUM(CNT1) as CNT1, SUM(CNT2) as CNT2, SUM(CNT3) as CNT3 FROM( SELECT B.SELECTER, B.SELECTER_NM, (CASE WHEN DEL_YN='N' AND USE_YN='Y' AND START_DT <= sysdatetime AND END_DT >= sysdatetime-1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT1, (CASE WHEN DEL_YN IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT2, (CASE WHEN DEL_YN='Y' OR USE_YN='N' OR START_DT > sysdatetime OR END_DT < sysdatetime-1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT3 FROM MC_POPUPZONE A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT #{site_id} AS SITE_ID, 1 AS SELECTER , '메인이미지' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT #{site_id} AS SITE_ID, 2 AS SELECTER , '팝업존' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT #{site_id} AS SITE_ID, 3 AS SELECTER , '하단롤링' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT #{site_id} AS SITE_ID, 4 AS SELECTER , '스카이팝업' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT #{site_id} AS SITE_ID, 5 AS SELECTER , '플로팅배너' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT #{site_id} AS SITE_ID, 10 AS SELECTER , '레이어팝업' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root ) B ON A.SELECTER = B.SELECTER AND A.SITE_ID=B.SITE_ID WHERE B.SITE_ID=#{site_id} ) T GROUP BY SELECTER, SELECTER_NM

SELECT B.SELECTER_NM, A.SELECTER, A.TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.START_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as START_DT, TO_CHAR(A.END_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as END_DT FROM MC_POPUPZONE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT 1 AS SELECTER , '메인이미지' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS SELECTER , '팝업존' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS SELECTER , '하단롤링' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS SELECTER , '스카이팝업' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS SELECTER , '플로팅배너' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root UNION ALL SELECT 10 AS SELECTER , '레이어팝업' AS SELECTER_NM FROM db_root ) B ON A.SELECTER = B.SELECTER WHERE A.SITE_ID=#{site_id} AND A.DEL_YN='N' AND A.USE_YN='Y' AND A.START_DT <= sysdatetime AND A.END_DT >= sysdatetime-1 AND TO_CHAR(A.END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_CHAR(sysdatetime, 'YYYYMMDD') <= 3
